title: winters Rift skin
body: ive seen sop many you tubers with the winter-skin for the rift im wondering where do i go to get it and is it allowed by riot?

replies.body: ok cool thank you and yeah its recent stuff, i saw Nightblue3 do a lot of videos and streams on the winter map and i kinda really want it ahaha

There are ways to dl 3rd party/custom skins, however they're a very use at your own risk kinda deal, as some of the programs used to implement them have other features which can result in permanent suspension of your account.

That said, if the videos you are seeing are recent, they are likely from the PBE (Public Beta Environment) as Riot have finally had the time/resources to make an official winter map skin for Summoner's Rift which is currently up on PBE and will most likely hit live sometime in the next month.
